Summary: Two sets of red and green flashing lights with white background
trends: There has been one other sighting in Louisa
There were no other sightings in Louisa on or around October 3rd 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsAt around ten pm my wife looked out a door towards her mothers house which she does every night when we get ready for bed.She told me their was some lights in the sky.I looked out their was a red and green flashing light so I got my binoculars and went outside,this object was to the north it then droped about a foots distance in the sky.as I watched a simular object apeared to the right,the red light was on the lower right hand side and the blue green was on the upper left side.I watched these for approximately,five minutes they never moved there was no sound then they droped behind the mountains.We watched simular objects in the summer of 08 they would appear at different places in the sky.
